meanings.definition: A person who publicly supports or recommends a product or service.
meanings.sent1: The endorser of the new shampoo brand appeared in a TV commercial.
meanings.sent2: The celebrity was the endorser for the popular clothing line.
meanings.sent3: The endorser of the healthy snack made everyone crave it.
meanings.sent4: She became the endorser of kindness, spreading positivity wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The endorser's smile made the product seem irresistible.

meanings.definition: One who signs a check or bill of exchange on the back to transfer ownership.
meanings.sent1: The endorser signed the check to pass it to the next person.
meanings.sent2: The endorser's signature on the document confirmed the transaction.
meanings.sent3: The endorser's penmanship on the paper was elegant and neat.
meanings.sent4: He was the endorser of the contract, sealing the deal with his signature.
meanings.sent5: The endorser's name on the back of the check indicated the transfer of ownership.
